Title: Switch Hitter
Plot: The Bluths rival development company hires Gob, who finds the company president a father figure, in preparation for the Bluth-Sitwell softball game; Lindsay hallucinates from taking anti-depressants.
GuestStars: Jayson Oertel, Ed Begley Jr., Andy Richter, Jeff Garlin, J.K. Simmons, Jake Hoffman, Danielle Cipolla, Steve Bannos, Jason Aaron Tinero
